songs.title: Amnesia
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I saw him standin' there in the parking lot
He asked if I came here a lot
And this is how I responded

[Pre-Chorus]
I forgot my name
I forgot my telephone number
If he wanna see me, he don't even know it
I forgot my address
Damsel in distress
I forgot my boyfriend was the one that had bought me this rock

[Chorus]
I get amnesia when I'm standin' next to you
He's been with me for several years, I know this much is true
Didn't know it was over til you came on over
And told me that you just, just can't forget about me

[Verse 1]
I talk to my girls
I can talk to my girls like crazy
To anyone, I speak my mind
I tell them off, it don't phase me
I'm not lazy, but boy lately
When I see you, I stutter
Watch you slip away like butterflies
I saw you standing there in the VIP on Friday
We conversate up in my fantasies, like, every day
But I'm a dud whenever you approach
Like yesterday, when you just came to say "Hello"

[Pre-Chorus]
I forgot my name
I forgot my telephone number
If he wanna see me, he don't even know it
I forgot my address
Damsel in distress
I forgot my boyfriend was the one that had bought me this rock

[Chorus]
I get amnesia when I'm standin' next to you
He's been with me for several years, I know this much is true
Didn't know it was over til you came on over
And told me that you just, just can't forget about me
Me, me
This is how I do

[Verse 2]
I talk to most guys
I can talk to most guys like crazy
To anyone, I'll speak my mind
I tell them off, it don’t faze me
But you shake me
Boy, you make me stop and stutter
When we touch, I melt like butter
I saw you standing there in the VIP on Saturday
Now that I know you got a thing for me
I should be straight
Not the kinda girl who'll just let any guy get close
All I can say is I'm gonna tell my guy he should just effin' go

[Pre-Chorus]
I forgot my name
I forgot my telephone number
If he wanna see me, he don't even know it
I forgot my address
Damsel in distress
I forgot my boyfriend was the one that had bought me this rock

[Chorus]
I get amnesia when I'm standing next to you
He's been with me for several years, I know this much is true
Didn't know it was over until you came on over
And told me that you just, just can't forget about me
Me, me
This is how I do
